greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter combining the number of divisors (A000005) and the sum of divisors (A000203) of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: Restricted growth sequence transform of a(n) = (1/2)*(2 + ((A000005(n) + A000203(n))^2) - A000005(n) - 3*A000203(n)).
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 03 2017
